messages.subject: Re:Sacramento confertence
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Pams and honorary members of the Pam Club, I somehow didn t receive a few digests so I didn t catch exactly who s coming to the Sacramento conference.  Just
messages.messageBody:
Hi Pams and honorary members of the Pam Club,

I somehow didn't receive a few digests so I didn't catch exactly who's coming
to the Sacramento conference. Just references to people improperly named!
:)

So how about this? Let's meet at the pool at about 5:15 on Saturday. If
some people can't stay long, we could at least try to come up with another time
and place there.

Pam T., hoping to actually get to see your replies this time


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
